description: This app asks from one to eight questions to determine if what you are thinking about posting to social media should actually be posted. Based on your response this app will tell you whether or not you should post.  This app will also give a New International Version (NIV) Bible scripture telling you why you should or should not post to social media.
name: Social Media Conscience
shortDescription: This app asks questions to determine if what you are thinking about posting to social media should actually be posted.
